ner: Toggle navigation POEMAGEA Visualization Tool in Support of Close Reading Overview Video Downloads Publications Team NEH 2016 Poemage is a visualization system for exploring the sonic topology of a poem We define sonic topology as the complex structures formed via the interaction of sonic patterns words connected through some sonic or linguistic resemblance across the space of the poem Poemage was developed at the University of Utah as part of an ongoing highly exploratory collaboration between data visualization experts and poets poetry scholars Additional details are provided in the
